argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a b

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mrclsp.u | |- U = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 2 |  | mrclsp.k | |- K = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 3 |  | mrclsp.f | |- F = ( mrCls ` U ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` W ) |
| 5 | 4, 1, 2 | #P_lspfval | |- ( W e. LMod -> K = ( a e. ~P ( Base ` W ) |-> |^| { b e. U | a C_ b } ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 1 | #P_lssmre | |- ( W e. LMod -> U e. ( Moore ` ( Base ` W ) ) ) |
| 7 | 3 | #P_mrcfval | |- ( U e. ( Moore ` ( Base ` W ) ) -> F = ( a e. ~P ( Base ` W ) |-> |^| { b e. U | a C_ b } ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. LMod -> F = ( a e. ~P ( Base ` W ) |-> |^| { b e. U | a C_ b } ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( W e. LMod -> K = F ) |
